name: 7th International Conference on Academic Research in Science, Technology and Engineering
content: The 7th International Conference on Academic Research in Science, Technology, and Engineering, scheduled for March 13-15, 2025, in Berlin, Germany, offers diverse participation opportunities for researchers worldwide. Attendees can choose to present their research orally to a truly international audience, but since presentation slots are limited, early abstract submission is strongly encouraged. Alternatively, participants can submit their research abstracts for poster presentations, showcasing their work to a global audience. For those unable to attend in person, the conference offers virtual presentation options to share research with the international community. All accepted and registered papers will have publication opportunities, enhancing their visibility and impact. Additionally, the conference provides an invitation letter for visa applications and offers a free city tour, allowing participants to explore the rich history and vibrant culture of Berlin with a friendly local guide.
